## Description
Brief description of the changes and their purpose.

## Type of Change
- [ ] New rule set (complete with all variants)
- [ ] Rule improvement (specify which variant)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Example addition

## Technology/Use Case
- **Use Case**: [e.g., api-development]
- **Technology**: [e.g., nestjs-typescript]
- **Variants Included**: [ ] Default [ ] Security-Focused [ ] Performance-Focused [ ] Minimal

## Testing
- [ ] Tested default rules in real project
- [ ] Tested specialized variants (if applicable)
- [ ] Verified Cursor behavior for each variant
- [ ] Checked for conflicts within and between variants
- [ ] Documentation is clear for all variants

## Checklist
- [ ] Follows repository structure with integrated approach
- [ ] Includes all appropriate variants (default, security-focused, performance-focused, minimal)
- [ ] Includes comprehensive documentation explaining when to use each variant
- [ ] Examples demonstrate improvements for the technology stack
- [ ] Rules are contextually integrated (security + performance + technology-specific)
- [ ] No conflicts between variants or with existing rules
